name: Jump for Gems (2D Platformer Project Full)
name_original: Jump for Gems (2D Platformer Project Full)
description:
This is my completed 2D Platformer Project.

Modifications:
- The two levels created in the tutorial videos were upgraded to be two separate unique levels.
- Three additional levels were added, giving a total of 5 full and unique levels.
- A new obstacle was created with original art, a "corrupted spike" that acts similar to acid, but is solid and static.
- Two enemies with unique behaviors were derived from existing enemies: a stationary boss enemy that must be dropped into acid to kill, and a "smart tough walking enemy."
- Instructions page given details.

Credits:
Created by Elex McCoy
Most assets provided by CAS 117
